name: Twilight Domain
description: Twilight clerics bring the comfort and protection of dusk to those who need it.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: Gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: Eyes of Night
1.description: You have 300-foot darkvision and can share it with others for 1 hour. Once per long rest or by expending a spell slot.

1.name: Vigilant Blessing
1.description: As an action, give a creature advantage on its next initiative roll.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
2.description: Create a 30-foot radius sphere of twilight that moves with you for 1 minute. Creatures ending their turns in it gain temporary hit points or end charm and fear effects.

6.name: Steps of Night
6.description: In dim light or darkness, use a bonus action to gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 minute. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Twilight Shroud
17.description: Creatures in your Twilight Sanctuary have half cover.
